data.sentence: The word وَلَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to wonder, menstruate, rejoice, inspire with awe, ridicule, laugh at, laugh, become clear.
data.sentence: The word وَتَضْحَكُونَ comes from the root ض ح ك and is associated with the meanings: to wonder, menstruate, rejoice, inspire with awe, ridicule, laugh at, laugh, become clear.

data.meanings: wept, lamented/grieved, shed tears, crying, cause to weep, rain, unable to speak.
data.sentence: The word تَبْكُونَ comes from the root ب ك ي and is associated with the meanings: wept, lamented/grieved, shed tears, crying, cause to weep, rain, unable to speak.
